title: Nancy Drew: Girl Detective: #1-4
description:
Let me introduce myself. I'm Nancy Drew. Some call me a girl detective. Others call me "that girl who cooked my goose." But everyone calls me sharp -- especially when it comes to crime. And since mystery and I follow each other everywhere, I'm pretty busy. Take a look inside at some of my favorite cases, and you'll see what I mean! #1 Without a Trace #2 A Race Against Time #3 False Notes #4 High RiskBook Details: 
   Format: Box Set 
   Publication Date: 10/5/2004 
   Pages: 640 
   Reading Level: Age 8 and Up
author: Carolyn Keene
